name: Emoji Quiz - Emojis Game
description:
Test your knowledge by answering Emoji Quiz! 🔥+🐶= Hotdog

Features:

Hints - Having a hard level? You can expose it or you can skip the levels using your coins!

Automatic levels download - When there are new update in the app on google play store don't need to update it just click new levels and it is automatic download new levels but we are recommended to update the app if there was update because sometimes the new feature of the app will not add.

Ask friends or family - Don't have coins for your hints? You can ask your friends or family members for help.

Challenging - Every 10 levels there was checkpoints means every 10 levels you will encounter random difficulty such as Very easy,Hard,Very hard,Extreme.

Have Fun and Enjoy!
